A stack of books:
Since the war began ticking time period, a disaster. The Giants led Kamael defied the gods. It angered the very Einhasad. Goddess raised Star Hammer and destroyed the empire of the giants and the island Granperion e Saghir. Several forts around Granperiona still tried to resist, but the loss of the ruling elite to take away their last hope for victory. Most of the forts were conquered and destroyed. Cave of the Giants was the last large-scale resisting fortress.
